Description: EXXOMOVE GmbH is a company focused on providing solutions for arm and hand mobility for individuals with disabilities. Their core offerings include the BATEO® Roboterarm, a robotic arm designed to assist individuals with limited arm mobility in performing everyday tasks, and the CARBONHAND® Orthese, a bionic hand orthosis that provides additional strength and endurance for weak hands. These products aim to enhance independence and quality of life for users. The BATEO is designed to be easily integrated with existing wheelchair controls and features soft-touch fingers for secure gripping, while the CARBONHAND uses sensors to detect pressure and amplify grip strength. The company targets individuals with conditions such as Arthrogryposis multiplex congenita, high spinal cord injuries, and advanced muscular dystrophies, as well as those with general hand weakness. EXXOMOVE participates in various rehabilitation and assistive technology trade shows, such as REHACARE and REHAB, to showcase their products and engage with potential customers and partners. They also collaborate with organizations like the Deutsche Gesellschaft für Muskelkranke e. V. (DGM) and rehaKIND. The CARBONHAND has been the subject of clinical studies demonstrating improvements in grip strength and hand functionality. EXXOMOVE offers consultations and trials of their products. Their stated goal is to provide smart mobility solutions that enable a more self-determined life for people with limited mobility. They also emphasize the importance of helping others and contributing to a more inclusive society. The company's business model appears to involve direct sales and partnerships with distributors and healthcare providers. They also highlight the innovative design and functionality of their products, such as the Carbonhand 2.0 with features like easy application, washability, and app-based customization.
Sales Line: I was reviewing your services, and it stood out how strongly you're positioned to enhance the independence and quality of life for individuals with limited mobility. Your innovative design reminds me of another company we recently supported; they were equally dedicated to providing cutting-edge solutions for healthcare providers, and together we significantly boosted their sales. Would it be unreasonable to explore how we achieved that and whether something similar could apply to your team?
Key Resonating Themes: Enhances independence and quality of life; Innovative design and functionality; Healthcare Providers target segment
USP/Key Selling Points: Enhances independence and quality of life; Easy integration with wheelchair controls; Soft-touch fingers for secure gripping; Amplifies grip strength; App-based customization (Carbonhand 2.0)
Customer Target Segments: Individuals with Arthrogryposis multiplex congenita; Individuals with high spinal cord injuries; Individuals with advanced muscular dystrophies; Individuals with general hand weakness; Healthcare Providers; Distributors
Business Model: Direct sales and partnerships with distributors and healthcare providers
Innovation Level Indicators: Highlights the innovative design and functionality of their products, such as the Carbonhand 2.0
Website Clarity Notes: The summary clearly communicates the business model and target audience.
